SEARCH
Package com.group7.ciapp

Class StoreBuildResult

java.lang.Object
com.group7.ciapp.StoreBuildResult
public class StoreBuildResult extends Object
This class is responsible for storing the build result and sending it to the GitHub API.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StoreBuildResult(String jwt)
    Get github token from environment variable.

  • Constructor Details

    • StoreBuildResult

      public StoreBuildResult(String jwt) throws Exception
      Get github token from environment variable.
      Parameters:
      jwt - (String) The GitHub token.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the GitHub token is not found.

  • Method Details

    • setStatusBuilding

      public Long setStatusBuilding(String commitHash, String owner, String repo) throws Exception
      Post request to GitHub API to flag commit as success or failure.
      Parameters:
      commitHash - (String) The hash of the commit being tested.
      owner - (String) The owner of the repo.
      repo - (boolean) The GitHub repo that is being used.
      Returns:
      (int) The check ID of the check run.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while sending the request.

    • setStatusComplete

      public void setStatusComplete(String commitHash, String owner, String repo, boolean isSuccess, Long checkID) throws Exception
      Sends a HTTP POST request containing the status of the build and tests. If successful, set "conclusion" to success. Otherwise, set "conclusion" to failure.
      Parameters:
      commitHash - (String) The hash of the commit being tested.
      owner - (String) The owner of the repo.
      repo - (boolean) The GitHub repo that is being used.
      isSuccess - (boolean) Says whether the tests passsed or not.
      checkID - (Long) The check ID of the check run.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while sending the request.
